sentences.en: Even the 56 poles balustrade around the base of the flag have a special meaning.
sentences.cn: 甚至是围绕旗杆底座的56根柱子也有特殊的含义.

sentences.en: Put the raincoat on the balustrade to drain.
sentences.cn: 把雨衣放在栏杆上去滴干.

sentences.en: She leaned over the balustrade and shouted to the man downstairs.
sentences.cn: 她俯身在阳台栏杆上对楼下的人们喊着.

sentences.en: So we lay on the roof under the balustrade.
sentences.cn: 于是我们就躺在屋顶的栏杆下面.

sentences.en: The stranger approached the balustrade. " What can I do for you, mesdemoiselles? " he asked eagerly.
sentences.cn: 无名氏走近栅栏,殷勤地问道: “ 小姐,您们叫我有何贵干? ”

sentences.en: These blackboards, chalked with figures, hung in a neat row all along the latticed balustrade of the gallery.
sentences.cn: 这些黑地白粉字的“牌子”站得整整齐齐，挂满了楼上那一带口字式的栏杆。

sentences.en: This painting has been reproduced over and over again, and almost everyone is familiar with the cherubs leaning on the balustrade .
sentences.cn: 这一幅画一再地已经被再生，而且几乎每个人在栏杆上熟悉天童倾斜。

trans.tran_en: a row of wooden, stone, or metal posts that stop someone falling from a bridge or  balcony
